text: Perinaldo is a comune in the Province of Imperia in the Liguria region in Italy. The 17th-century Italian naturalised French astronomer Giovanni Domenico Cassini was born here. == Twin towns == Perinaldo is twinned with: * Tourves, France, since 1993 * Buey Arriba, Cuba == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Settlements in Imperia
title: Perinaldo
